metadata.title: RH850 using double map mode in GHS

sections.content:
Question:
I got some device file(dr7f702301.dvf) from renesas which was working well for GHS multi debug connection until I change the controller flash map from single map to double map.
In double map mode, if I use this device file, I get the below error during connection.
<Server Output> RSU info write error 0x576: param err (no match specified map mode).
Should I get a different device file for doublemap mode? If yes, please provide the same.
Answer:
in case of double map mode, please add below option in the connection string:
 -dwmap
Use Double Map Mode.
    If "-dwmap" is omitted, 850eserv2 connects Single Map Mode.
Suitable Products
RH850
